resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/75998</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75998</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>effb0cfe-42a4-4e8e-8824-b3dd204edca1#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A kálium-halogenidek</string>
            <string language="en">The potassium halides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kaliumhalogenide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les halogénures de potassium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os halides do potassium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli alogenuri del potassio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα αλογονίδια καλίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los halides del potasio</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A kálium-klorid-, kálium-bromid- és kálium-jodid-oldat viselkedése klóros vízzel</string>
            <string language="en">The behaviour of the potassium chloride solution, the potassium bromide solution and the potassium iodide solution against water</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">halogénelemek,  ionvegyület,  </string>
            <string language="en">halogen elements, ionic compound</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Verhalten der Kaliumchlorverbindung Lösung, 
der Kaliumbromidlösung und der Kaliumjodidlösung gegen Wasser</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le comportement de la solution de chlorure de 
potassium, de la solution de bromure de potassium et de la solution 
d'iodure de potassium contre l'eau</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O comportamento da solução do cloreto do 
potassium, da solução do brometo do potassium e da solução do 
iodide do potassium de encontro à água</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il comportamento della soluzione del cloruro del 
potassio, della soluzione del bromuro del potassio e della soluzione 
dello ioduro del potassio contro acqua</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η συμπεριφορά της λύσης χλωριδίου καλίου, της λύσης 
βρωμίδιων καλίου και της iodide καλίου λύσης ενάντια στο ύδωρ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El comportamiento de la solución del cloruro del
potasio, de la solución del bromuro del potasio y de la solución del
yoduro del potasio contra el agua</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Halogenelemente, Ionenmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éléments d'halogène, composé ionique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">elementos do halogênio, composto ionic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">elementi dell'alogeno, residuo ionico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στοιχεία αλόγονου, ιοντική ένωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">elementos del halógeno, compuesto iónico</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>195</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>75998</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=effb0cfe-42a4-4e8e-8824-b3dd204edca1&v=1&b=2</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
